intro.subtitle: Angular front-end developer passionate about creating amazing digital experiences.

about_me.paragraph_1: Angular Frontend Developer with 1+ years of experience in creating and implementing scalable, responsive, and high-performance web applications. Proficient in Angular, TypeScript, RxJS, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), with a strong focus on clean architecture, user experience (UX), and performance optimization.
about_me.paragraph_2: Throughout my journey, I have worked on several challenging projects, always seeking to learn new technologies and improve my skills. I believe in the importance of clean code, best practices, and teamwork.
about_me.paragraph_3: I have basic English proficiency, which allows me to understand technical documentation, follow tutorials, and study international content to continuously improve my skills.
